name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: [SOUND] This lecture is about

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: how to mine text data with

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: social network as context.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: In this lecture we're going to continue discussing contextual text mining.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _In particular
column6: we're going to look at the social network of others as context. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _So first
column6: what's our motivation for using network context for analysis of text? _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: The context of a text article can form a network.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: For example the authors of research articles

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: might form collaboration networks.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: But authors of social media content might form social networks.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _For example
column6: in Twitter people might follow each other. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _Or in Facebook as people might claim friends of others

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So such context connects the content of the others.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _Similarly
column6: locations associated with text can also be connected to form _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: geographical network.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: But in general you can can imagine the metadata of the text data

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: can form some kind of network if they have some relations.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: Now there is some benefit in jointly analyzing text and

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: its social network context or network context in general.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And that's because we can use network to impose some constraints on topics of text.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So for example it's reasonable to assume that authors

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: connected in collaboration networks tend to write about the similar topics.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So such heuristics can be used to guide us in analyzing topics.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: Text also can help characterize the content associated with each subnetwork.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And this is to say that both

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _kinds of data

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So for example the difference in opinions expressed that are in

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: two subnetworks can be reviewed by doing this type of joint analysis.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So here briefly you could use a model called a network supervised topic model.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: In this slide we're going to give some general ideas.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And then in the next slide we're going to give some more details.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: But in general in this part of the course we don't have enough time to cover

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: these frontier topics in detail.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: But we provide references that would allow you to

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: read more about the topic to know the details.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: But it should still be useful to know the general ideas.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And to know what they can do to know when you might be able to use them.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So the general idea of network supervised topic model is the following.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: Let's start with viewing the regular topic models.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: Like if you had an LDA as sorting optimization problem.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _Of course

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: the optimization objective function is a likelihood function.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So we often use maximum likelihood estimator to obtain the parameters.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And these parameters will give us useful information that we want to

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: obtain from text data.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _For example

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So we want to maximize the probability of tests that are given the parameters

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: generally denoted by number.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: The main idea of incorporating network is

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: to think about the constraints that can be imposed based on the network.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _In general
column6: the idea is to use the network to _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _impose some constraints on the model parameters

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _For example

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: the text at adjacent nodes of the network can be similar to cover similar topics.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _Indeed
column7: they tend to cover similar topics. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So we may be able to smooth the topic distributions

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: on the graph on the network so that adjacent nodes will have

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: very similar topic distributions.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So they will share a common distribution on the topics.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _Or have just a slight variations of the topic of distributions

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _So
column7: what we can do is simply to add a network and _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: use the regularizers to the likelihood of objective function as shown here.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So instead of just optimize the probability of test

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _data given parameters lambda
column6: we're going to optimize another function F. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: This function combines the likelihood with a regularizer function called R here.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And the regularizer defines the the parameters lambda and the Network.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: It tells us basically

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: what kind of parameters are preferred from a network constraint perspective.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So you can easily see this is in effect

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: implementing the idea of imposing some prior on the model parameters.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _Only that we're not necessary having a probabilistic model

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: the idea is the same.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: We're going to combine the two in one single objective function.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _So
column6: the advantage of this idea is that it's quite general. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: Here the top model can be any generative model for text.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _It doesn't have to be PLSA or LEA

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _And similarly
column6: the network can be also in a network. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: Any graph that connects these text objects.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: This regularizer can also be any regularizer.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: We can be flexible in capturing different heuristics that we want to capture.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _And finally
column6: the function F can also vary

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: there can be many different ways to combine them.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _So
column6: this general idea is actually quite

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: It offers a general approach to combining these different

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: types of data in single optimization framework.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And this general idea can really be applied for any problem.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _But here in this paper reference here

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: a particular instantiation called a NetPLSA was started.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _In this case

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: instantiating of PLSA to incorporate this simple constraint imposed by network.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And the prior here is the neighbors on

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: the network must have similar topic distribution.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: They must cover similar topics in similar ways.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And that's basically what it says in English.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So technically we just have a modified objective function here.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: Let's define both the texts you can actually see in the network graph G here.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _And if you look at this formula

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: you can actually recognize some part fairly familiarly.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _Because they are
column6: they should be fairly familiar to you by now. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So can you recognize which part is the likelihood for

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: the test given the topic model?

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _Well if you look at it
column6: you will see this part is precisely the PLSA log-likelihood _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: that we want to maximize when we estimate parameters for PLSA alone.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: But the second equation shows some additional constraints on the parameters.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _And in particular
column6: we'll see here it's to measure _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: the difference between the topic coverage at node u and node v.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: The two adjacent nodes on the network.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: We want their distributions to be similar.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So here we are computing the square of their differences and

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: we want to minimize this difference.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _And note that there's a negative sign in front of this sum

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So this makes it possible to find

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: the parameters that are both to

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: maximize the PLSA log-likelihood.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _That means the parameters will fit the data well and

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: also to respect that this constraint from the network.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And this is the negative sign that I just mentioned.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _Because this is an negative sign

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: object in function we'll actually minimize this statement term here.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So if we look further in this picture we'll see

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: the results will weight of edge between u and v here.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And that space from out network.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _If you have a weight that says well

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: these two nodes are strong collaborators of researchers.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: These two are strong connections between two people in a social network.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And they would have weight.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: Then that means it would be more important that they're topic coverages are similar.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And that's basically what it says here.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And finally you see a parameter lambda here.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: This is a new parameter to control the influence of network constraint.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _We can see easily
column7: we just go back to the standard PLSA. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _But when lambda is set to a larger value

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: then we will let the network influence the estimated models more.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _So as you can see
column6: the effect here is that we're going to do basically PLSA. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: But we're going to also try to make the topic coverages

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: on the two nodes that are strongly connected to be similar.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And we ensure their coverages are similar.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _So here are some of the several results

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: This is slide shows the record results of using PLSA.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _And the data here is DBLP data

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: about research articles.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And the experiments have to do with using four communities of applications.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: IR information retrieval.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: DM stands for data mining.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: ML for machinery and web.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _There are four communities of articles

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: to see that the topic mining can help us uncover these four communities.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: But from these assembled topics that you have seen here that are generated by PLSA.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And PLSA is unable to generate the four communities that

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: correspond to our intuition.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: The reason was because they are all mixed together and

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: there are many words that are shared by these communities.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So it's not that easy to use four topics to separate them.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _If we use more topics
column6: perhaps we will have more coherent topics. _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _But what's interesting is that if we use the NetPLSA where the network

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: the collaboration network in this case of authors is used to impose constraints.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And in this case we also use four topics.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: But Ned Pierre said we gave much more meaningful topics.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So here we'll see that these topics correspond well to the four communities.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: The first is information retrieval.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: The second is data mining.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: Third is machine learning.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And the fourth is web.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So that separation was mostly because of the influence of network

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: where with leverage is a collaboration network information.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: Essentially the people that form a collaborating network

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: would then be kind of assumed to write about similar topics.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And that's why we're going to have more coherent topics.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _And if you just listen to text data alone based on the occurrences

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: you won't get such coherent topics.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _Even though a topic model

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: LDA also should be able to pick up co-occurring words.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So in general the topics that they generate represent

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: words that co-occur each other.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _But still they cannot generate such a coherent results as NetPLSA

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: showing that the network contest is very useful here.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: Now a similar model could have been also useful to to characterize the content

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: associated with each subnetwork of collaborations.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So a more general view of text mining in context of network is you

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: treat text as living in a rich information network environment.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And that means we can connect all the related data together as a big network.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And text data can be associated with a lot of structures in the network.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _For example
column6: text data can be associated with the nodes of the network

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: that's basically what we just discussed in the NetPLSA.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _But text data can be associated with age as well

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And such a way to represent texts that are in the big environment of

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: all the context information is very powerful.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _Because it allows to analyze all the data

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: _And so in general
column6: analysis of text should be using the entire network _

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: information that's related to the text data.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: So here's one suggested reading.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: And this is the paper about NetPLSA where you can find more details about the model

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: and how to make such a model.

name: 5 - 9 - 4.9 Contextual Text Mining- Mining Topics with Social Network Context (00-14-43).srt
text: [MUSIC]
